title: Remembering Robert Badinter, France’s Minister of Justice, who was shaped by the Holocaust – HAMEC Blog

quotes: In 1983, while he was Minister of Justice, Klaus Barbie, the man who had arrested and sent Badinter’s father to his death at Sobibor, was found in Bolivia and extradited to France.
